data.name: Human Madness
data.detailed_description:
Human Madness is a multiplayer shooter game


Features:

- weapon customization:
for now the game contain 11 weapons, but we working to add more soon

- character set customization:
there is different variety of cloth

- Weapon System:
you can shoot behind walls , the bullet damage will reduced depend on the material of the wall

- AI system:
8*8 Bot

- Game mode:
you can Choose from two factions (police and rioters ) and play in team death match

data.short_description: Human Madness is a multiplayer shooter game
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit) Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD A10 with 4 physical cores
  • Graphics: Geforce GT 720 or AMD Radeon HD 7870 with at least 2 GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Running the Dedicated Server and Client on the same computer will double ram requirements. Also future releases may require more hard drive space.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher (64-bit) Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen with 6 physical cores
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon 570 with at least 4GB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Running the Dedicated Server and Client on the same computer will double ram requirements. Also future releases may require more hard drive space.
